titleStmt.title: An answeare to the supplication Against him, who seeming to giue the King counsel to become a Catholike, indeuoureth to stirre vp his good subiectes vnto rebellion. Faithfully translated out of French by E.A.
titleStmt.author: Aggas, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shop right ouer against the great south doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: A translation, By Edward Aggas, of the French original.
Running title reads: An answere to the supplication exhibited to the King.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop right ouer against the great south doore of Paules
